titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide certain additional protection for the disability ratings of veterans with service-connected disabilities rated total for not less than 10 years.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 8/5/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to provide that a rating of total disability or permanent total disability which has been made for purposes of the administration of veterans' benefits, and which has been continuously in force for ten or more years but which has been proposed to be reduced under a decision made by the Veterans Administration, may not be reduced during the period of any administrative appeal of such decision.
